    • Constructor Detail

      • Arrow

        public Arrow(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world,
             float positionX,
             float positionY,
             int damage,
             Sprite archer)
        Parameters:
        world - box2d world object in which arrow's collider will be spawned
        positionX - x coordinate of spawning position
        positionY - y coordinate of spawning position
        damage - how much damage arrow will deal on impact
        archer - shooter's object
